headline: This Old Curse Rings a Bit Hollow
abstract: Nicolas Pesce’s new horror movie remake has its chilling moments but ultimately remains cursed by a fatally hokey concept.
lead_paragraph: As the initiated surely recall, the grudge of “The Grudge” is a curse that arises when someone dies in a rage. The curse torments those who contract it with visions of wet-haired apparitions, disembodied limbs, mute children or whatever else might strike a screenwriter’s fancy.
